Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the Id for the namespace, such as ns-e4anhexample0004.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the namespace, such as arn:aws:service-discovery:us-east-1:123456789012:http-namespace/http-namespace-a1bzhi.
